definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
European Community, old term for EU, European Union 歐盟|欧盟[Ou1 meng2]

sentences.english: Prime Minister Ted Heath takes Britain into the European Community
sentences.chinese: 1973年希思首相把英國帶入歐洲共同體。

sentences.english: Intergrowth relationship is the unity of individual and community.
sentences.chinese: 共生關係是共同體與個體的統一。

sentences.english: CARICOM countries made this high-level event happen.
sentences.chinese: 這次高級別會議是在加勒比共同體國家提議下舉行的。

sentences.english: Rio group summit will set up a Latin American and Caribbean States Community.
sentences.chinese: 里約集團峯會將成立拉美及加勒比國家共同體。

sentences.english: ASEAN community construction and East Asia cooperation move forward.
sentences.chinese: 東盟共同體建設和東亞合作向前推進。

sentences.english: Neal Communities is based in Manatee County.
sentences.chinese: 尼爾共同體總部設在馬納提縣。

sentences.english: North Korea is unlikely to be a founder member.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮則不大可能混到一個共同體創始國的頭銜。

sentences.english: And we will do so in partnership with Muslim communities which are also threatened.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們將和也遭受威脅的穆斯林共同體一起這麼做。

sentences.english: Second, we should foster a general environment for integrated development and form an Asian community of common destiny.
sentences.chinese: 第二，構建融合發展的大格局，形成亞洲命運共同體。

sentences.english: That process is symbolized by the European Union and its predecessor, the European Economic Community.
sentences.chinese: 這項進程的象徵是歐盟和它的前身歐洲經濟共同體。

sentences.english: Over-production is seriously unbalancing the EEC economy.
sentences.chinese: 因生產過剩，歐洲共同體經濟嚴重失衡。

sentences.english: But a common external tariff exists for non-eec countries.
sentences.chinese: 但是對非共同體的國家則實行統一的對外稅則。

sentences.english: The CEMAC is the economic and monetary community of central Africa.
sentences.chinese: CEMAC是中非經濟與貨幣共同體的簡稱。

sentences.english: Public Law generated in China with accompanied by the formation of the Community.
sentences.chinese: 公法在中國是伴隨着共同體的形成而生成的。

sentences.english: This is what makes her so alarming to the development community.
sentences.chinese: 這使她對發展共同體來說是那麼令人害怕。

sentences.english: Community of face Han economy " it is child of assuasive of relation of Korea peninsula north and south."
sentences.chinese: “朝韓經濟共同體”是朝鮮半島南北關係緩和的產物。

definition: to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
